alert.note: Alert for Baker; Early; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 4:22PM EDT until June 18 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... West central Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/. * At 421 PM EDT/321 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbia, or 9 miles east of Headland, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Donalsonville, Blakely, Headland, Columbia, Douglasville, Centerville, Gordon, Iron City, Damascus, Jakin, Haleburg, Saffold, Tumbleton, Sigma, Grandberry Crossroads, Mayhaw, Rock Hill, Pleasant Plains and Sharphagen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
